events.title: Advanced Manufacturing Workshop
events.description: Hands-on workshop covering modern manufacturing techniques including 3D printing, CNC machining, and quality control systems. Students will work with industry-standard equipment.

events.title: Future of Robotics Seminar
events.description: Industry expert talk on the latest developments in robotics and automation, covering AI integration, autonomous systems, and future career opportunities.

events.title: Design Competition Finals
events.description: Final presentation and judging of student design projects. Teams will present innovative solutions to real-world engineering challenges.

events.title: New Year Community Celebration
events.description: Community celebration to welcome the new year with cultural performances, networking opportunities, and refreshments.

events.title: Automotive Plant Visit
events.description: Educational visit to a leading automotive manufacturing facility to observe modern production techniques and quality control processes.

events.title: General Body Meeting
events.description: Monthly general body meeting to discuss upcoming events, budget allocations, and association matters. All members are encouraged to attend.

events.title: Physics Wallah Talk
events.description: Inspiring educational talk by Physics Wallah team on innovative learning methodologies and career guidance in engineering. Learn about modern approaches to education and career opportunities in the engineering field.

events.title: Industry Visit: Automotive Manufacturing
events.description: Educational visit to explore modern automotive manufacturing processes and quality control systems.

events.title: Research Symposium 2025
events.description: Annual research symposium showcasing student and faculty research projects in mechanical engineering.

events.title: CAD Workshop
events.description: Hands-on workshop on advanced CAD modeling techniques using SolidWorks and AutoCAD.

events.title: Industry Expert Talk
events.description: Expert talk on emerging trends in mechanical engineering and career opportunities in the industry.

events.title: Team Building Event
events.description: Fun team building activities and networking session for MESA members.
